Percentage of trips that leave more than 5 minutes later than predicted

30%

5%

UC Berkeley

Stops along Shattuck Avenue experience significant delays (up to one third of trips)

Stops along the 51B route towards Berkeley Amtrak have a low frequency of delays

Note that stops along 51B Berkeley Amtrak —which are usually scheduled to arrive every 10 min—are relatively reliable, experiencing significant delays for 8% of trips.

Stops along Shattuck Ave southbound experience the highest frequency of significant delays (up to 33% of trips).
